data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Arsenal Tula with the kick-off.
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Lokomotiv Moscow pushes forward through Anton Miranchuk, whose finish on goal is saved.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow territory.
In Moscow Arsenal Tula attack through Abdul Mohammed. The finish is off target, however.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In the minute 8, Grzegorz Krychowiak (Lokomotiv Moscow) has received a first yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Can Lokomotiv Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
Free kick in a good position for Lokomotiv Moscow!
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In the minute 12, Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Dmitrii Zhivoglyadov has run offside.
Important block from the Lokomotiv Moscow defence as Alesandr Lomovitskiy fires in a strike for Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 15, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 17, Throw-in high up the field for Lokomotiv Moscow in Moscow.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Ze Luis goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Ze Luis gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 18, Arsenal Tula needs to be cautious. Lokomotiv Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Arsenal Tula.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 21, Vedran Corluka (Lokomotiv Moscow) gets a yellow card.
In Moscow, Kirill Panchenko of Arsenal Tula is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Lokomotiv Moscow push forward at RZD Arena and Vladislav Ignatev gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Arsenal Tula defence.
In the minute 25, Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Throw-in Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 26, Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 28, Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow close to the penalty box.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Moscow to check on Gia Grigalava, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 31, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a Lokomotiv Moscow throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Lokomotiv Moscow are pushing forward but Anton Miranchuk's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Arsenal Tula at RZD Arena.
The away team has substituted Gia Grigalava with Georgi Kostadinov. Dmitri Parfenov is thus making his first change.
In the minute 34, Lokomotiv Moscow push upfield but Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi quickly pulls them for offside.
Ball safe as Lokomotiv Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Free kick Lokomotiv Moscow.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 37, Kirill Panchenko (Arsenal Tula) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 39, Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Can Lokomotiv Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 43, Lokomotiv Moscow's Vladislav Ignatev gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Arsenal Tula defender.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Anton Miranchuk breaks free at RZD Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Arsenal Tula at RZD Arena.
In the minute 44, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 45, Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Free kick Arsenal Tula.
Alesandr Lomovitskiy of Arsenal Tula gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, He's off! Vedran Corluka is shown a second yellow card.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi blows to start the second-half. Lokomotiv Moscow with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Marko Nikolic (Lokomotiv Moscow) is making a first substitution, with Vitali Lystsov replacing Eder.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Throw-in Arsenal Tula.
Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 52, Goran Causic is booked for the away team.
Murilo Cerqueira (Lokomotiv Moscow) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Arsenal Tula defenders.
In the minute 53, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a throw-in for Arsenal Tula, close to Lokomotiv Moscow's area.
Arsenal Tula are coming forward and Kirill Panchenko gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In Moscow Arsenal Tula drive forward through Kirill Panchenko. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 59, Luka Djordjevic for Arsenal Tula gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Arsenal Tula close to the penalty box.
In the minute 61, Arsenal Tula push forward at RZD Arena and Aleksandr Dovbnya gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Lokomotiv Moscow defence.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
In the minute 71, Penalty! Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi points to the spot, great chance for Lokomotiv Moscow...
Anton Miranchuk converts the penalty to give Lokomotiv Moscow a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 73, Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Arsenal Tula make their second substitution with Vladislav Panteleyev replacing Kirill Panchenko.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 75, Georgi Kostadinov is booked for the away team.
In Moscow Arsenal Tula drive forward through Alesandr Lomovitskiy. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 77, Goal kick for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Igor Gorbatenko is replacing Daniil Khlusevich for the away team.
In the minute 78, Can Lokomotiv Moscow capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a Lokomotiv Moscow throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
In the minute 80, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Lokomotiv Moscow goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
In the minute 84, Can Arsenal Tula capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow at RZD Arena.
In the minute 86, Lokomotiv Moscow needs to be cautious. Arsenal Tula have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Lokomotiv Moscow.
Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
In the minute 87, Arsenal Tula have a dangerous throw-in.
Arsenal Tula's Aleksandr Dovbnya misses with an attempt on goal.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Vladislav Ignatev for Lokomotiv Moscow who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Aleksei Vasilevich Sukhoi signals a Lokomotiv Moscow throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
Vladislav Ignatev, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Dmitry Rybchinskiy is the substitute for Lokomotiv Moscow.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow close to the penalty box.
Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
At RZD Arena the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
That's full-time at RZD Arena. The final score is 1-0.
The home team replace Anton Miranchuk with Francois Kamano.
